title: Error installing 0.3.0 from Anaconda on MacOS 10.13.1
body_html:
Trying to upgrade my PyTorch version to 0.3.0 on MacOS 10.13.1. I created a clean conda environment and attempted to install, but got an error

conda install -c pytorch pytorch 
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: 

PackageNotFoundError: Dependency missing in current osx-64 channels: 
  - pytorch -> mkl >=2018

So I installed mkl:

conda install -c anaconda mkl

Now mkl is installed:

# packages in environment at /Users/mat/miniconda3/envs/pytorch:
#
certifi                   2016.2.28                py36_0  
intel-openmp              2018.0.0             h8158457_8    anaconda
mkl                       2018.0.1             hfbd8650_4    anaconda
openssl                   1.0.2l                        0  
pip                       9.0.1                    py36_1  
python                    3.6.2                         0  
readline                  6.2                           2  
setuptools                36.4.0                   py36_1  
sqlite                    3.13.0                        0  
tk                        8.5.18                        0  
wheel                     0.29.0                   py36_0  
xz                        5.2.3                         0  
zlib                      1.2.11                        0

Still can't install PyTorch.

conda install pytorch -c pytorch
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: .


UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch

body:
Trying to upgrade my PyTorch version to 0.3.0 on MacOS 10.13.1. I created a clean conda environment and attempted to install, but got an error

```bash
conda install -c pytorch pytorch 
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: 

PackageNotFoundError: Dependency missing in current osx-64 channels: 
  - pytorch -> mkl >=2018
```

So I installed `mkl`:
```bash
conda install -c anaconda mkl
```

Now `mkl` is installed:
```bash
# packages in environment at /Users/mat/miniconda3/envs/pytorch:
#
certifi                   2016.2.28                py36_0  
intel-openmp              2018.0.0             h8158457_8    anaconda
mkl                       2018.0.1             hfbd8650_4    anaconda
openssl                   1.0.2l                        0  
pip                       9.0.1                    py36_1  
python                    3.6.2                         0  
readline                  6.2                           2  
setuptools                36.4.0                   py36_1  
sqlite                    3.13.0                        0  
tk                        8.5.18                        0  
wheel                     0.29.0                   py36_0  
xz                        5.2.3                         0  
zlib                      1.2.11                        0
```

Still can't install PyTorch.

```
conda install pytorch -c pytorch
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: .


UnsatisfiableError: The following specifications were found to be in conflict:
  - pytorch
```
